resources.string: Remember that treble ending in -s, -n, or vowel are stressed.
Remember that you must accentuate the esdrújulas.
Remember to differentiate the v\'s and b\'s correctly.
Remember that there are words that have h and you don\'t know it.
Remember to read the questions well.
Do you want to know what each mode consists of?
Do you have doubts with any word?
You have not selected an option
Congratulations, you have completed the test

This game mode is a replica of the opposition exam, you have 100 minutes to answer 100 questions, you can mark GOOD, BAD, or SKIP, if you skip it, you will have to answer it at the end, when you finish or the time is up, it will show you the punctuation and errors.
In this game mode you have 10 lives, 10 possible failures, the objective is to answer as many questions as possible before you run out of lives, there is no time limit
